TopicTitle: Need someone who can make music and a intro video

Articles.Content:
Hey there I just started my own youtube series and was wondering if anyone would be interested in throwing together some space like musical loops and someone else (or the same person) to make a brief KSP intro. I will be giving full credit to whoever makes these any time I use them. I currently only have one video posted and it could use some work. I have two more videos being made right now and i wouldn't mind beefing them up a bit. So let me know in a reply or message if you would be interested in helping me out.

Also here is a link to my first video,

Thank you

I think i'll release a unlisted video, gimme a little bit of time.

it will be 5-15 seconds, i haven't started it yet.

I will start once you pick one of these music choices:

1. Gaslamp fireworks:

(from 0:02)

2. Alchemists tower : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bOHpZQtBK5w (From 0:13)

3. Batty McFaddin :

(From 0:00)

4. Deep Haze :

(From 0:00)

If you use this intro, give credit to Kevin Macleod!

Pick one so i know what "theme" the intro is going to be.

(Also, Can I use My Footage, not only yours? It would make the process alot faster.)

Your welcome!
I really like Gaslamp fire works. And you can use whatever footage you need. I have quite a bit of unedited footage for my next two episodes I could send to you.
